text:
March 15, 1955
Mr. M. S. Novik
300 W. 23rd Street
Hew York 11, Hew York
Dear Harriet
Ho further word from Stir ton, and nothing further for you to
do for the time being.
See you in Amherst, though Ifll be derneri if I know how I111
get there. Probably will fly to Springfield and take a Hertz Drive
it yourself, with Bidiaek, if possible.
Regards,
HJSswo
cct Schooley
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
